episodes_names: Episode 1 - Go-Home Club Applicants \ Life is Short; Go Home, Young Lady \ Beware of Hagizuki-ryuu Practitioners \ Extravagant Youth: Priceless

Episode 7 - Sealed Words!! \ The Fierce Battle's Conclusion!! \ Surprise Party
